thread.section_title: Executive Hotel LeSoleil - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Well located but spacious room
thread.title_full: Well located but spacious room - Review of Executive Hotel LeSoleil, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Terence V
title: Well located but spacious room
text:
Location is great - easy walk to great restaurants yet off the beaten tourist track enough to be be less crowded. Easy walk to Madison Square Gardens and Macy's. Plenty of Irish pubs and big variety of eating establishments at reasonable prices. Book at the hotel's restaurant to get a table as they are popular. Good value for money accomodation.
Room Tip: Request high level room as police cars are busy until late at night. See more room tips
